newsitem.title: Nigeria: Port conditions update - Nigeria - Lloyds Shipping.
newsitem.headline: Port conditions update - Nigeria - Lloyds Shipping.

text.p: Port conditions from Lloyds Shipping Intelligence Service --

NIGERIA, DEC 13 - Lagos - Port is currently congested due to dredging operations and berthing delays occurring to product tankers. No berthing delays reported to general cargo vessels. It is anticipated that congestion should clear within five days.
Port Harcourt - Port operating normally, no berthing delays reported. All crude terminals loading according to programme.
